description: Cool down with this refreshing, tropical icy pole recipe that you can whip up in just two simple steps.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Tropical Icy Poles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango, pineapple and juice, and sugar in a blender, then blend until smooth. Reserving 1/4 cup mango mixture in blender, divide remaining mango mixture among 8 x 1/3-cup capacity popsicle moulds until three-quarters full.

Add raspberries and yoghurt to remaining mango mixture and blend until smooth. Divide yoghurt mixture among moulds, then use a popsicle stick to gently stir mixture to create an ombre effect. Insert a popsicle stick into each mould, then freeze overnight. Serve.
